scene_description: A worker is operating a large press brake machine, bending a metal sheet. The worker's hands are in close proximity to the machine's pinch point during operation, with a very close call observed where the machine closed immediately after the worker removed his hands.
safety_response: Implement strict lockout/tagout procedures and ensure proper guarding is in place for the press brake machine. Mandate the use of two-hand controls or light curtains to prevent hands from entering the pinch point during operation. Conduct a thorough review of safe operating procedures and provide refresher training to all operators.
